text: Gladys Thomas (born 1934) is a South African poet and playwright. Thomas was one of the first black South African women poets to be published. ==Works== * Cry Rage!, 1972 * Exile Within, 1986 * Spotty Dog and Other Stories: Stories for and of South African Township Children, c.1983 * Avalon Court (Vignettes of Life of the Coloured People on the Cape Flats of Cape Town) ==References== Category:1934 births Category:Living people Category:South African poets Category:South African dramatists and playwrights Category:South African children's writers Category:South African women writers Category:South African women poets
